posts.post_title: N566 Newsboys for Sale - Price Drop
posts.post_content:
W.H. Dad Clark - $800

[url]http://rustywilly.com/largecards/1895N566Clark.htm[/url]

Excellent mount with significant loosening on both sides of the photographic layer

J.J. Doyle - $550

[url]http://rustywilly.com/largecards/1895N566Doyle.htm[/url]

Light crease at top, heavy staining along right border both front and back, and loosening of all layers along the right border - photo and mount.  Pencil writing in upper right of reverse.

Email if interested:  [url]info@rustywilly.com[/url]
